physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Restlessness and nuchal rigidity; no rash.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Symptoms resolved spontaneously after discontinuation of H. pylori eradication therapy. Recurrence of symptoms upon restarting therapy, which resolved again after discontinuation. Subsequent episodes of meningism developed with new therapy substitutions, resolving within 72 hours of drug cessation.
